## VMWithPlaywright.calibrateMouse property

Function allowing to create a [VMMouse](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.md) object that is calibrated for a specific playwright frame and allowing to easily send low-level mouse events to the virtual machine, using coordinates related to the browser viewport or DOM elements.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
calibrateMouse: CalibrateMouseFunction;
```
